scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -m 'bump version for fixes minor changes'
scripts.copy:files: rm -f 'assets/js/legacy/*' && copyfiles -f node_modules/flexibility/flexibility.js node_modules/html5shiv/dist/html5shiv.min.js assets/js/legacy && rm -rf assets/fonts/ && copyfiles -u 2 '_app/fonts/**/*.*' ./assets/fonts/
scripts.uglify:jsjquery: mkdir -p assets/js && uglifyjs _app/js/*.js -m -o assets/js/app.js && uglifyjs node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js _app/js/*.js -m -c -o assets/js/app.min.js
scripts.uglify:js: mkdir -p assets/js && uglifyjs _app/js/site.js -m -o assets/js/app.js && uglifyjs node_modules/list.js/dist/list.js _app/js/*.js -m -c -o assets/js/app.min.js
scripts.uglify:js-listjs: mkdir -p assets/js && uglifyjs _app/js/listjs.js -m -o assets/js/listjs.js && uglifyjs node_modules/list.js/dist/list.js _app/js/listjs.js -m -c -o assets/js/listjs.min.js
scripts.uglify:js-lunrjs: mkdir -p assets/js && uglifyjs _app/js/lunr.js -m -o assets/js/lunr.js && uglifyjs node_modules/lunr/lunr.js _app/js/lunr.js -m -c -o assets/js/lunr.min.js
scripts.build:js: npm run lint:js && npm run uglify:js-listjs && npm run uglify:js-lunrjs
scripts.initialize: npm-run-all copy:files build:css build:js uglify:js-lunrjs compress:img build:jekyll
scripts.start: npm-run-all build:jekyll --parallel watch:css watch:js watch:jekyll watch:img serve
